Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will play as the favorite to defend its Copa America title.
The tournament could mark the 36-year-old Messi’s final act with the national team.
Argentina tops the qualifying after six matches.
Midfielder Mac Allister will have a good opportunity to show he has developed further as a player if he can keep Argentina moving when Messi’s energy goes down during games.
Striker Martinez will have another chance to show a good club season for him in Europe can translate into great form with the national team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia.
The game will be broadcast on FS1.
The teams will face off on Thursday, June 20, 2024, at 8 p.m. ET.
Others: Fans who want to watch the game in person can purchase tickets via StubHub, VividSeats, or Ticketsmarter.
Lionel Messi and Argentina will try to win their third straight major title when they defend their Copa America championship.
Canada will make its debut in the Copa America tournament.
